the next best thing.translation[0].defin: something that is not exactly what you want but is as similar to it as possible
If sterile equipment isn’t available, the next best thing is to clean equipment with disinfectant.
the next best thing.translation[1].defin: the thing or situation that is almost as good as the one you really want
If I can’t be home for Christmas, phoning you on the day is the next best thing.
